name: Sad Cloud Simulator
description:
This game was made as part of the Mini Jam 26: Storms

Sad Cloud Simulator is a two player split-screen game with two distinct players, Sunny the Sad Cloud and Jeffery. 

Sunny wants to make Jeffery sad by raining on him and striking him with lightning, you can move sunny with WASD and rain using "v", if you are able to rain on Jeffery three times you can strike him with lightning with "n". 

Jeffery is a busy man who has places to be, use the arrow keys to walk him to the next bus stop without being rained on or struck by lightning.

Mechanics and Controls:

Sunny: WASD move

Sunny : V Rain, the blue bar at the top of the screen shows the amount of water left in sunny's cloud, move over water to evaporate more water into your cloud. 

Sunny: N Strike Lightning, the yellow bar at the top of the screen shows the amount of lightning points you have, you can attain lightning points by raining on Jeffery when he is not under an umbrella or a tree, when you have three lightning points you can strike lightning

Jeffery: Arrow Keys move

Jeffery: "/" or "?" to put up an umbrella, protects you from rain, but goes down as soon as you start moving again, prevents you from moving for 2 seconds after you put it up, umbrellas can be struck by lightning which destroys it

Jeffery: Stand under a tree to protect yourself from rain

Sorry about the lack of tutorial, time is short in the mini game jam!

Will and Jack
